name: Evergrow
description:
Overview
Solve puzzles in the handcrafted forests of Evergrow through the eyes of an imaginative child and his parents. Discover their unfolding story told through the child's ever-changing room. Gameplay
In each puzzle, the player must guide the Paper Rabbit to fill all tiles with grass while avoiding obstacles and using special tiles.



Special Tiles






Obstacles

Features
  • Solve 50 unique and challenging puzzles
  • Stunning visuals and music
  • A story waiting to be discovered
